summary: Frontend testing of Dashboard Attendance Overview chart filters. All 8 requested features tested and verified working correctly.

dashboard_loads_after_login.description: Dashboard page loads successfully after admin/admin login

attendance_overview_chart_displays_data.description: Chart displays attendance data with Present (blue), Late (amber), Absent (red) lines

team_filter_dropdown_shows_all_teams.description: Team filter dropdown shows 'All Teams' + 14 specific teams (Compiler, Framework, Data, Tokenizer, Administration, Product Management, Sales, Marketing, Business Development, Customer Success)

team_filter_correctly_filters_chart_data.description: Selecting specific team (e.g., 'Data', 'Administration') updates chart with filtered data - Y-axis scale changes appropriately

date_range_filter_shows_all_options.description: Date range filter shows all 6 options: Today, This Week, Last Week, This Month, Last Month, Custom

date_range_filter_updates_chart_data.description: Changing date range (Today, Last Week, This Month) updates chart data accordingly

custom_date_range_shows_date_inputs.description: Selecting 'Custom' date range displays two date input fields (from/to) with data-testid attributes

chart_tooltip_displays_correct_values.description: Hovering over chart shows tooltip with present, late, absent values for each day

context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard Attendance Overview chart filters fully functional. Team filter (All Teams + 14 teams), Date range filter (Today, This Week, Last Week, This Month, Last Month, Custom), and Custom date range inputs all working correctly. Chart data updates dynamically based on filter selections.
